cast.name: 布鲁诺·比齐尔 Bruno Bichir
亚丽杭德拉·安布罗西 Alejandra Ambrosi
阿玛拉·维拉富尔特 Amara Villafuerte

introduction: Three stories, united by characters in common, that open the doors to sexual freedom: Romance is seen in three different stages of life, at 20, 30 and 40, in three intertwined stories. A married couple in search of new adventures, invite a nurse to join them for a threesome. The nurse falls in love with the wrong man, an old doctor friend. He takes some photographs of hers, to open up and achieve the search for a desired orgasm; and a teenage boy in love with a girl, lives a night of unexpected passion, without having it planned, but not only with the girl he wants also her fer friend.
